attributes.additional_details: Urgently carry out full enquiry into all aspects of the perpetrators of grooming gangs.
attributes.background: Carry out enquiry into ethnicity religion and connection to police and local authority of grooming gangs.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for similar action:

Grooming gang national enquiry to name officials and consider failures to act
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/730532
